parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.08

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Locations

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the size (radius)  of a location.

The width  is 2 * x, the height is 2 * y.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> location '''setSize''' size

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> location: [[Location]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> size: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myLocation [[setSize]] [10,30]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[size]]
</value></part></template>
